summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York daily assignment roster for Saturday, August 10, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (sick, annual) for correctional and non-correctional services personnel. The document appears to be a routine prison administrative record.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Staff Assignments

locations: MCC NEW YORK, NEW YORK, NY
keyFacts: Document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 10, 2019.
It lists numerous correctional officer posts (SHU, CONTROL, ESCORT, LOBBY, etc.) and tracks shift changes, sick leave, and annual leave.
The roster includes the names of several correctional officers (Noel, T; Thomas, M; Davis, m; Washington, cl; Leatharn, K; DeJesus, N; Ling, M).
The document is an administrative record showing the normal operation of the prison facility on that date.
The document was processed/archived on June 2, 2021.
